name: Smith
description: Smithing is the art of creating and repairing items using an anvil. The higher the level, the more items can be repaired and the more items can be enchanted.

actions.description: As a Smith, you can earn job experience by crafting tools and armor. From swords to hoes, all types of tools and armor will help you level up in the Smith job and become a better craftsman.
Smelting ores is another way to earn job experience as a Smith. By smelting ores, you can increase your level. Don't forget about coal, lapis lazuli, and redstone - they count too!

Grinding items together is a unique skill that only a true Smith can master. By grinding items like tools, you'll earn even more job experience and level up faster. Keep grinding away, and you'll become a legendary Smith in no time!

Using an anvil is a fundamental skill for any Smith. Repairing and renaming items will earn you job experience and help you become a more versatile crafter. With every anvil use, you'll get closer to becoming a master Smith.
